file_content.text: [You try to activate the hologram, but nothing happens.]
[On closer examination, the holoprojector has been carefully pried from its base and removed.]
Master Yuon, I've encountered a problem. One of the holoprojectors has been stolen.
Stolen? But the Flesh Raiders don't steal, they destroy. I'll look into this.
If you have the other holograms, come and meet me at the Jedi Temple. I'm sending you directions now.
